研究揭示热浪对撒哈拉以南非洲地区围产儿死亡的影响由于气候变化，撒哈拉以南非洲地区的热浪预计将变得更加普遍。卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员和其他人在《自然医学》上发表的一项新研究揭示了怀孕最后一周的高温与死产和早期新生儿死亡率增加之间存在令人担忧的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Research-reveals-impact-of-heatwaves-on-perinatal-deaths-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Research-reveals-impact-of-heatwaves-on-perinatal-deaths-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=561a19ef-b3d3-4e74-9bf4-fa52cfd925b0 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:24:00 -0400 Research reveals impact of heatwaves on perinatal deaths in sub-Saharan Africa
研究表明头发皮质醇水平较高与儿童行为问题更大在 INMA 项目的一项针对 11 岁儿童的研究中，巴斯克地区大学 (UPV/EHU) 巴斯克环境健康研究小组成员 Ane Arregi 得出的结论是，更大的行为问题与更高的行为问题有关。头发皮质醇水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-links-higher-hair-cortisol-levels-to-greater-behavioral-problems-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-links-higher-hair-cortisol-levels-to-greater-behavioral-problems-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=970ef33a-973e-4dba-a851-11564be643ee Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:12:23 -0400 Study links higher hair cortisol levels to greater behavioral problems in children

研究表明β细胞可以独立发挥血糖控制作用我们的血糖平衡基于胰腺β细胞检测葡萄糖和分泌胰岛素以维持血糖水平的能力。如果这些细胞发生故障，平衡就会被打破，从而患上糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-beta-cells-can-function-independently-for-glycemic-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-beta-cells-can-function-independently-for-glycemic-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90b9ae70-de0d-4803-897c-6ab1573e6396 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 06:56:10 -0400 Study shows beta cells can function independently for glycemic control
在孕产妇护理危机中，加州大学旧金山分校倾向于为护士助产士提供昂贵的博士课程加州两个护士助产士培训项目之一已停止招收学生，同时修改课程设置，只提供博士学位，此举引起了校友、卫生政策专家和教职员工的强烈抗议，他们指责加州大学将利润高于公共卫生需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/UCSF-favors-pricey-Doctor-program-for-nurse-midwives-amid-maternal-care-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/UCSF-favors-pricey-Doctor-program-for-nurse-midwives-amid-maternal-care-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd962cd0-60f1-4386-948d-2dd1a24c20f2 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 06:42:08 -0400 UCSF favors pricey doctoral program for nurse-midwives amid maternal care crisis

欧洲心脏病学会强调肥胖与心脏病之间的联系未被充分认识肥胖是心血管疾病的一个关键因素，促使 ESC 推荐全面的预防和管理策略，以降低健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/European-Society-of-Cardiology-highlights-underrecognized-link- Between-obesity-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/European-Society-of-Cardiology-highlights-underrecognized-link- Between-obesity-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=149ce209-78b2-46bc-931e-eef152696d56 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 05:59:00 -0400 European Society of Cardiology highlights underrecognized link between obesity and heart disease
